item.title: Deploy Azure Static Web App using Bicep and YAML pipeline
item.description: When you build some kind of web application it might be interesting to have a look at Azure Static Web Apps. This is a very light weight service which doesn’t have to cost much, and can even be free. This is the first in a series of posts about Azure Static Web Apps. In this post I will start with the basics and show how to deploy a html page to a free Static Web App.
